full_text: Ezra Blount, a 9-year-old Dallas boy, has become the youngest person to die from injuries suffered during the crowd surge at Travis Scott's Astroworld Festival https://t.co/fYlCH597nJ

localize.full_text: 9歳のダラスの少年Ezra Blountが、Travis ScottのAstroworld Festival https://t.co/fYlCH597nJ で起こった群衆の急増で受けた傷が原因で死亡した最年少の人物となりました。
达拉斯9岁男孩Ezra Blount成为在Travis Scott的Astroworld音乐节上因人群激增而受伤死亡的最年轻的人https://t.co/fYlCH597nJ。
達拉斯9歲男孩Ezra Blount成爲在Travis Scott的Astroworld音樂節上因人羣激增而受傷死亡的最年輕的人https://t.co/fYlCH597nJ。
